Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_MIDI_VALUE

The basic type MILES_MIDI_VALUE specifies a MIDI controller that can queried.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 110 XMIDI Channel Lock.
 111 XMIDI Channel Lock Protection.
 112 XMIDI Voice Protection.
 114 XMIDI Patch Bank Select.
 115 XMIDI Indirect Controller Prefix.
 119 XMIDI Callback Trigger.
 1 MIDI Modulation.
 7 MIDI Part Volume.
 10 MIDI Panpot.
 11 MIDI Expression.
 64 MIDI Sustain Pedal.
 91 General MIDI Reverb.
 93 General MIDI Chorus.


Group: XMIDI Services
Related Functions: AIL_controller_value
